title: Change Password (request)
description: Change Password. Note: This call is only available when authenticated using an OAuth token.

new_password.description: New password (Accepts any printable ASCII character. Must be within 8-25 characters, and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters. Must not be the same as the user's email address)

old_password.description: Old password for validation (non-empty string, accepts any printable ASCII character)

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
